Sidrych, yes you did trunks chinish ... and body armor?
A. .. are you about the pieces that grip? Yes, a good barrel will be. True doroguschy. So what do you want repaired? I warn you - it's expensive, the more wear - the more expensive. So?
Repair the first barrel.
Repair the second hole.
Repair the armor.
Heck, with the money strained. Come back later.
Right now ... all instantly make...\nDone, take!
Yes ... Marked One, cool your shabby.\nSo ... somewhere I had armored ... Aha, here they are ... like this ... Yeah ... phew. Get, like new!
Hmm. Excellent work! Hey, where are you so pricked? Silent? Oh well.
Master work, not for nothing that kind of money you take.
Could something else to fix?
Come on, do.\n\nThe list of possible repairs:
Bartender, you accidentally guns and armor does not chinish?
In truth, I - no. But I have here in the kitchen otrabatyvet their debts a stalker, a good gunsmith. He knows how to repair, and weapons and armor, and instructed him to task. So we fix?

Patch up the armor.
Damn, money as always is not enough. Come then.
Here you are all corrected as possible!
Catch all that can be done!
Wow! Like new! Your gunsmith is really the master. Give him my regards.
And indeed, great job!
And he may still something to fix?
Of course, he still is now a little work.
You do not patching?
Yes, if necessary, can distract from their studies. True, the tool I have little, fix this is just my hobby, so cost is not cheap.
Repair the first barrel.
Repair the second hole.

Heck, with the money strained. Come back later.
Wait a bit...\nAll that could - did take away!
Armored here today deficit, but I have a stock. Wait here ...\nHere ... How long will...
Well done! Feel free gunsmith repaired.
Conscience you will be clean, work for 5 +!!!
Fix something else?
Come quickly, while the data is still being processed, do.
Sorry, but I'm here to repair your weapons ... how are you with the rates?
Hahaha ... Fear not, without socks will not leave, I'm not a miser, as everyone thinks. So what do you want repaired? Processing, this is not cheap, the more wear - the more expensive. So?

Repair your armor.
Money is not enough ... Come another time.

Marked One on your case the label "shoot here" is not it? Okay, let's ... do...\nOnly for you, fresh armored from the fridge! And I also slipped a label!
As good as new! Excellent work!
Joker Shoot ... Although ... Now even more pleasant to look at her!
And one more thing to fix?
Of course, you just do not forget to pay, "a duty" not chinyu.
I would like to repair your weapons ... how are you with the rates?
